EmailTemplate.description: Weekly MGE Steering Committee Candidature files
EmailTemplate.name: Weekly MGE Steering Committee Candidature files
EmailTemplate.subject: Weekly MGE Steering Committee Candidature files
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The electronic files prepared for this week’s Steering Committee are listed below and can be accessed via the Steering Committee drive.
We have expanded the number of files to better represent the types of cases for your approval.
Matters for review include:
Extension to Thesis Submission Date Re-Admission Leave Writing up Away Scholarship Extension Other matters
Many thanks for your consideration.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve
Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
